amendment.description: To protect the American people and strengthen our national security by fully funding the Biomedical Advanced Research and Development Authority (BARDA) and the BioShield Special Reserve Fund.

vote.text: Amendment SA 458 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 458 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Burr. (consideration: CR 3/26/2015 S2014-2022; text as modified: CR 3/26/2015 S2017) To protect the American people and strengthen our national security by fully funding the Biomedical Advanced Research and Development Authority (BARDA) and the BioShield Special Reserve Fund.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 458 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 458 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Burr.
